revised_title: Synaptic Organization of Cone Cells in the Turtle Retina: A Golgi and Electron Microscopy Study
tldr: This study examines the synaptic organization of cone cells in the turtle retina using both Golgi and electron microscopy methods. The research identifies the specialized contacts between cone pedicles and bipolar, horizontal, and other cell processes. The findings provide insights into the structure and function of cone cell synapses in the turtle retina.
